articles.description: The verdict is announced in Manchester City's legal case against the Premier League's associated party transaction rules.
articles.title: Manchester City: Verdict reached in Premier League APT legal case

articles.description: England face South Africa in the Women’s T20 World Cup at Sharjah Cricket Association Stadium, Sharjah – follow text updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: England vs South Africa LIVE: Women’s T20 World Cup – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights and text updates

articles.description: England toiled on the opening day of the first Test but they, and stand-in skipper, Ollie Pope did just fine, says chief cricket writer Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England: Tourists and Ollie Pope do just fine on opening day of first Test in Multan

articles.description: Netherlands legend Johan Neeskens dies at the age of 73, the Dutch football federation confirms.
articles.title: Former Netherlands midfielder Neeskens dies aged 73

articles.description: Tyrrell Hatton's victory at last week's Dunhill Links Championship provides pause for thought about how Europe’s leading tour might approach an uncertain future, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: How Tyrrell Hatton's Dunhill Links win may help end PGA Tour, DP World Tour and LIV paralysis

articles.description: As Manchester United head into the international break in the bottom half of the table, closer to the relegation places than the top of the table, how realistic are their Champions League hopes?
articles.title: How realistic are Manchester United's Champions League hopes?

articles.description: Jurickson Profar of the San Diego Padres was targeted by LA Dodgers fans who threw baseballs and beer at him during a heated game two of the National League Division Series.
articles.title: LA Dodgers-San Diego Padres game delayed after fans throw baseballs and beer at Jurickson Profar

articles.description: NBA great LeBron James, 39, has played alongside son Bronny, 20, for the first time in a game with the Los Angeles Lakers.
articles.title: LeBron James and Bronny James make NBA father and son history with Los Angeles Lakers

articles.description: Celtic defender Greg Taylor will miss Scotland's Nations League matches against Croatia and Portugal this month, and goalkeeper Angus Gunn is a fitness doubt.
articles.title: Nations League: Celtic's Greg Taylor joins Scotland injury list

articles.description: Lamar Jackson stars in a thrilling Baltimore Ravens comeback and Caleb Williams has his best game in another exciting Sunday in the NFL.
articles.title: NFL results & week five recap: Lamar Jackson, Dak Prescott & Jayden Daniels shine in wins for Ravens, Cowboys & Commanders
